is.hgo2.reviewSearchHelper

Class AmazonClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hgo2.reviewSearchHelper.AmazonClient

  • public class AmazonClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates and sends requests to the Amazon Product Advertising API. The Product Advertising API, Developer Guide (API Version 2011-08-01) was used integrate to the API. (see : http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSECommerceService/latest/DG/Welcome.html)

    • Method Detail

      • createParameterMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createParameterMap(java.lang.String operation)
        Creates the base API request with common mandatory parameters:

        - AWS Access KeyID

        - Timestamp (now)

        - Associate tag

        - Service

        - Operation

        Parameters:
        operation - which operation the request should execute e.g. ItemSearch, ItemLookup
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the common mandatory parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value)

      • createStandardSearchRequest

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createStandardSearchRequest(java.lang.String keyword)
        Creates the standard search request used in this project according to the selection strategy for the systematic review.

        SearchIndex = Books

        Power search parameters=keywords:%s and language:english

        Sort = relevancerank, sorted by how often and where the keyword appears, how closely multiple keywords occur in descriptions and how often customers purchased the products they found using the keyword {Amazon 2011}.

        MerchantId = Amazon, only look at available books that are sold by Amazon - excludes books sold by third party sellers

        Availability = available, excludes unavailable books

        Parameters:
        keyword - the search keyword which replaces %s (see above), this is either Productivity, Personal Productivity, Efficient, Effective(ness) or knowledge worker productivity
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the common mandatory parameters and the standard search request parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value)

      • createStandardLookupRequest

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createStandardLookupRequest(java.lang.String ASIN)
        Creates the standard lookup request by asin. The asin's are fetched from the search requests.
        Parameters:
        ASIN - amazon standard item number
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the common mandatory parameters and the standard search request parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value)

      • createEditorialLookupRequest

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createEditorialLookupRequest(java.lang.String ASIN)
        Creates the standard editorial lookup request by asin. The asin's are fetched from the search requests.
        Parameters:
        ASIN - amazon standard item number
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the common mandatory parameters and the standard search request parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value)

      • getBinSearchRequest

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBinSearchRequest(java.lang.String keyword,
                                                                   java.lang.String browseNodeId,
                                                                   java.lang.String searchPageNumber)
        Creates a binSearch request using the standard search request with the addition of these parameters:

        ResponseGroup = SearchBins, this tells the request to return a list of bins, which are categorized lists by subject connected to a specific browseNodeId.

        BrowseNodeId = this is the id of a browseNode which is specified in a bin, narrowing the results to just the ones in this browseNode. A browseNode is a book category which is part of an organizational hierarchy.

        Parameters:
        keyword - the search keyword, this is either Productivity, Personal Productivity, Efficient, Effective(ness) or knowledge worker productivity
        browseNodeId - the id of a specific browseNode (bin)
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the common mandatory parameters, the standard search parameters and the binSearch parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value)

      • sendSearchRequest

        public ItemSearchResponse sendSearchRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                   java.lang.String endpoint)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends an ItemSearch request to Amazon.
        Parameters:
        params - hashmap with the request parameters (key = parameter name; value = parameter value) must include the mandatory common parameters
        endpoint - the Amazon locale to search, either; CA, CN, DE, ES, FR, IN, IT, JP, UK, US. Be aware of different requirements for different locales
        Returns:
        the response as an ItemSearchResponse java object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        ASIN - amazon standard item number
        endpoint - amazon locale, the ending of the url http://amazon. , e.g. com, co.uk etc...

      • sendBinSearchRequest

        public ItemSearchResponse sendBinSearchRequest(java.lang.String keyword,
                                      java.lang.String browseNodeId,
                                      java.lang.String itemPageNumber,
                                      java.lang.String endpoint)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends an binSearch request to amazon
        Parameters:
        keyword - search keyword
        browseNodeId - browseNode id to narrow the search
        itemPageNumber - result page number, a value between 1-10
        Returns:
        itemSearchResponse
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
